players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Does anyone have any information or observations to share?"
Charlie: "Since Bob and Alice both stayed silent, it's hard to get a read on anyone. We need to start somewhere though - maybe we should vote for someone who isn't contributing to help the town?"
You: "I'm deeply saddened by Diana's death and I want to help find the truth. I didn't see or hear anything unusual during the night."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob

players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "This is terrible! Diana was killed on the first night. We need to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Does anyone have any information or observations to share?"
Charlie: "Since Bob and Alice both stayed silent, it's hard to get a read on anyone. We need to start somewhere though - maybe we should vote for someone who isn't contributing to help the town?"
Alice: "I'm deeply saddened by Diana's death and I want to help find the truth. I didn't see or hear anything unusual during the night."
